subject: Yankee Stadium (NYC)
lead_paragraph: Kenny Leandry does not want to be known as the local kid who lives across the street and got a job with the Yankees, but the Yankees’ media relations assistant does live across the street.
snippet: Kenny Leandry does not want to be known as the local kid who lives across the street and got a job with the Yankees, but the Yankees’ media relations assistant does live across the street.
